title: Man arrested after stabbing himself to get day off work (4 photos)
text:
1 
A Japanese businessman named Masaru Miura stabbed himself in the hip to get a day off work . 
The 54-year-old told police that he was stabbed by an unknown assailant. But when the cops found holes in his story, he confessed that he was lying and had stabbed himself with a knife he found on the subway. He was then placed under arrest for interfering with police duties. 2 GIF 
The news report says the Japanese workforce is ridiculously intense, which probably means the poor guy couldn’t call in for a sick day (maybe that’s why they wear those face masks all the time). 3 
Imagine working a job so shitty and strict that you’re only way to escape for even a day is to plunge a damn knife into your hip. 
This guy was fed up. Everyday, he had to pack into those absurdly crowded Japanese subway cars like a sardine, put up with a boss who makes him bow down like a slave, then go home at the end of a long shift and jerk off to porn with blurred penetration before climbing into bed. BLURRED PENETRATION. It’s cruel. I don’t blame him for grabbing a knife off the floor of a dirty subway and sticking himself with it. Anything for a break from that routine. 4
